title: Ice Cream Penney Lyrics Vaaliba Raja Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ice Cream Penney (remix)
Singer(s):Radhan, Arjun
Movie: Vaaliba Rajan
Music: Radhan
Lyrics: Arjun

Unna pattha udaney
manasukulla pongudhey pongudhey.
en iravu kanniyaaga
vandhu kollura kollura .

Unna paakkaamal ennaala
thoongathaan mudiyala
adiye nee ennathaan
pannenu ketka puriyala.

we were meant to be
like a destiny
can you fill it our baby baby.
When you next to me
I can never see
anyone else but you baby.

Penne nee sirikkum sirippil
sikki nikkura.
penne nee enathaan pakkayil
vikki thikkura.

coz gonna believe that
you sat them next to me.
yesterday I was facebook talking you
now u sitting face to face with me
simple close i just dont what to do

Passiyum edukkala, thokkam varavilla
thaniyaa polamburen ennadi senja
Sirikkum sirippila
kannakuliyula enna thallura enna kollura

if you if you come to me baby
i swear am gonna make you love me
no no dont you worry
you know that am ready ready.

if you if you come to me baby
i swear am gonna make you happy
no no dont you worry
you know that am ready ready.

You are you are my ice cream lady
chocolate venila strawberry baby
if you get a minute bebe IM me
facebook whatsapp just contact me.

penne, what you call the fell that i feel
penne, tell me is this fantasy or is this real.

Passiyum edukkala, thokkam varavilla
thaniyaa polamburen ennadi senja
I cant believe that she
sat there next to me
its just happened, O so quickly

if you if you come to me baby
i swear am gonna make you love me
no no dont you worry
you know that am ready ready.

if you if you come to me baby
i swear am gonna make you happy
no no dont you worry
you know that am ready ready.

Unna pattha udaney
manasukulla pongudhey pongudhey.
en iravu kanniyaaga
vandhu kollura kollura .

Unna paakkaamal ennaala
thoongathaan mudiyala
adiye nee ennathaan
pannenu ketka puriyala.

if you if you come to me baby
i swear am gonna make you love me
no no dont you worry
you know that am ready ready.

if you if you come to me baby
i swear am gonna make you happy
no no dont you worry
you know that am ready ready.

coz am ready for you baby
come n get it, come n get it.Â
